name: Super 8 Motel - San Jose Airport/Santa Clara Area

reviews.text: Was a little wary of this place in view of previous reviews, but was pleasantly surprised. Good check in.
reviews.title: Good quality room

reviews.text: Nice quality big room, good bathroom, and quite quiet bearing in mind the proximity of the airport. Good clean bedding. The pool is in the centre of the quadrangle, nicely positioned, looked like it needed cleaning, but to be fair, I don't think the pool season has really started yet as it was pretty chilly. Quite a good breakfast offering considering it's free. There's a reasonable Mexican restaurant contained within the front of the building.
reviews.title: There must be a better Choice
Nice
reviews.text: My only criticism was that a motel this big, and otherwise setting good standards, has no guest laundry.

As we were getting in on a late flight we were looking for an average hotel to basically sleep till the next morning. However we were disappointed in this hotel. The sheets on the beds were threadbare and had holes. The blankets should have been replaced years ago. Although the bathroom floor and countertop had been updated with granite looking tiles, the place had a shabby feel about it. Morning could not come soon enough. There must have been a better choice.
reviews.title: Great location very clean rooms

likes.liked: — Fresh New Rooms / key hole pool

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Finally, a hotel that has internet access! After almost a week of traveling and staying at hotels that advertised internet access, this was the first one that actually had it!
reviews.title: Horrible!
Great for the money
reviews.text: I stayed here four nights. Best Super 8 Motel i ever stayed. Nice and clean rooms. Beautiful Keyhole shape pool and on site restaurant made my stay comfortable and plasent. Best hotel for the price i paid and very friendly and helpfull guest service.

reviews.title: Could have been a whole lot better
reviews.text: This isn't really awful or anything, it's on a nice block in San Jose, BUT, my room was right near this late night sports bar that booms music until late in the morning. When you have an early flight it would be nice to get some sleep.

aka: Super 8 Motel - San Jose Airport/Santa Clara Area Hotel
